| HistoryText             = Calling on the Demons of Darkness, the fury of the thousand winds, and the witchery of the endless night, Mogul summoned the Demon-Riders, sending them to kill [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Thor]] and the [[Warriors Three (Earth-616)|Warriors Three]] as they approached [[Zanadu]], the Mystic Mountain. They rode behind [[Alibar (Earth-616)|Alibar]], who soon realized that they were not merely following him, and that they would trample and slay him if he slackened his pace for a second.{{Citation}}
